title: How to reinstall Grammarly for iPhone
content:
First, uninstall the Grammarly app from your device:
Touch and hold Grammarlyâ€™s companion app.
Tap
Remove App
.
Tap
Delete
App
and then tap
Delete
to confirm.
Once that's done, visit
this page
and
click
Install
next to the Grammarly listing to download the app on your device.
When the app is installed, open it and click
Get Started
. If you already have a Grammarly account, tap
Log in to existing account
and enter your login credentials. If not, tap
Continue with email
to create an account.
